subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Sept. 30 (AP) — Germany defended its Women’s World Cup title with a 2-0 victory over Brazil on Sunday that was underlined by a flawless, unyielding defense.
snippet: SHANGHAI, Sept. 30 (AP) — Germany defended its Women’s World Cup title with a 2-0 victory over Brazil on Sunday that was underlined by a flawless, unyielding defense.
